javautils.holders
Class ShortHolder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javautils.holders.AbstractHolder
        |
        +--javautils.holders.ShortHolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class ShortHolder
extends AbstractHolder

A simple mutable holder for short-values. This class is designed to be used in situations in which you need to store shorts in collections or when you want to be able to mutate an short from an anonymous inner class, for example.

See Also:
